org.trianacode.taskgraph

Interface TaskGraphFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TaskGraphFactoryImp

    public interface TaskGraphFactory
    A factory for creating taskgraphs.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String FACTORY_NAME 
      static java.lang.String TASKGRAPH_FACTORY_RENDENRING_HINT
      The rendering hint used to denote the preferred taskgraph factory

        java.lang.String[] getRegisteredProxyTypes()

      • getRegisteredTaskGraphFactories

      • isRegisteredTaskGraphFactory

        boolean isRegisteredTaskGraphFactory(java.lang.String proxytype)
        Returns:
